comment._content: You're right.  I guess that means we should stop trying to make those darned electric cars!  Too many batteries in them.  Are you serious?  Of course it has gotten better.  People all over ere recycling and reusing.  It is far from perfect, but it is still a new concept to most.  We've grown up to be a society that just throws everything away and just go get a new one that we have had to learn how to do things differently. Then again we did ask for cheap products and that is what we got.  Many towns still don't have proper recycling facilities to even be able to recycle many items.  Where I live they have even passed laws that make it almost impossible for you to even take an old vehicle to a salvage yard to be dismantled and recycled.  If that isn't going too far I don't know what is.
